title: GeoData Gateway GeoRSS
name: GeoData Gateway GeoRSS
description: The GDG's REST API provides you with a powerful way to access and embed GDG content directly in other web applications or pages. The GDG REST interface is available through both internet and intranet access points. The intranet URL provides users with access to the full set of EPA records (restricted and unrestricted) without requiring that users login, while the internet URL only provides those users who are logged into the GDG with access to restricted records. Only those users who can get to EPA's intranet can access the intranet URL. Those who cannot access EPA's intranet must use the internet URL.
